title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“[Mr. Bob Calvert] wore an oxygen mask during the 90-minute flight. He and his machine weighed a total of 30 kg.” [From The Times (London), March 9, 1984, p. 2: That's microlight!]
